episode.title: Miami Herald Publishing Company v. Tornillo

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I also have for announcement number 73-797, Miami Herald Publishing Co. against Tornillo and for reasons stated in an opinion filed today, the judgment of the Supreme Court of Florida is reversed.
Mr. Justice Brennan, with whom Mr. Justice Rehnquist joined, filed a concurring statement.
Mr. Justice White also filed a concurring opinion.
